mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee(NAME, created_at) VALUES(#{name}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT r.resume_name, r.employee_id, r.resume_image, r.highschool_name, r.highschool_startdate, r.highschool_enddate, r.highschool_major, r.univ_name, r.univ_startdate, r.univ_enddate, r.univ_major, r.univ_grades, r.prev_co, r.career_period, r.career_position, r.career_department, r.career_task, r.job_id, r.is_main, r.created_at, e.employee_name employee_name, e.employee_birth employee_birth, e.employee_sex employee_sex, e.employee_email employee_email, e.employee_tel employee_tel, e.employee_location employee_location FROM resume r LEFT OUTER JOIN employee e ON r.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE resume_id = #{resumeId}
